items.text: floated outside off, and he goes down on one knee to slog-sweep it. There's a man at deep midwicket though, so it's only a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on the stumps, on a good length. He comes forward to tickle it to short midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: tossed up, fuller ball on the stumps, he goes on the front foot and hits it back powerfully. Shakib gets a hand to it, but can't stop it
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: flatter outside off, he slaps it to long-off with a horizontal bat
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Reem Rahim: "I think BD management Took a great decision to left out Imrul kayes.They brought back Soumya Sarkar at 3 which is a great decision and Sarkar is always Agressive in those opening and Number 3 position..Keeping in mind that World Cup will be in Bouncy pitches..Imrul have less amount of Shots in is hands..Despite Scoring 349 Vs Zim i think this is a good decision! "
items.text: tossed up on leg stump, and worked to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: tossed up again, on middle stump that time, and he brings his bat down straight to drive to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: angled into the batsman but too full, and flicked off his toes to mid-on. Quick single taken, and though the fielder hit the stumps direct, Bravo was safe
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: flatter but strays on the pads, Hope goes back to flick it, but straight to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: strays on the pads again, Bravo goes back to flick it finer that time, but finds short fine leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: goes straighter, spinning into him from off stump, and he stands tall to punch to long-on
items.postText: End of my spell. Over to Hemant
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks, Saurabh. Bangladesh struck early but these two have kept the scorecard ticking. Here is Mashrafe.
items.text: length outside off, punched off the back foot but straight towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: length, on middle and leg this time, punched again, this time to a straight-ish short midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: back of length once more, in the line of the stumps, punched towards long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length, around middle and off, stays back and punches it towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: a similar line and length, not giving any room to the batsmen, punched once more towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.text: slower one, 118 kph, pitching outside leg, Bravo was early into the shot, misses and gets hit on the pads
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run

items.preText: Sumanth: "Imrul Kayes is few of the technically sound batsmen Bangla has got. Soumya Sarkar is one of those players who gets multiple chances hoping that he would click at some point. Dropping kales for sarkar is not a great decision "
items.text: length on middle and leg, tucked away behind square
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball, coming in with the arm, Bravo was looking to work it on the leg side, gets beaten and is hit on the pads, was going down
items.postText: Shorifsust: "SarfBD, i respect your comment on Tamim's matured batting. Yes, Tamim has been providing more effective innings after changes his super aggressivenes. But, you must agree we miss his offensive style! "
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: length outside off, steered towards point
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: length again, just outside off, defended again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: short of length, some room as well, goes back and cuts it towards deep extra cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, punches it towards long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: Meanwhile, Isam pings: "Oshane Thomas has been "rested" according to the West Indies team management. Interesting move, keeping in mind what Rovman Powell said about what he thought of using pace against Bangladesh."
items.text: a bit fuller and wider, driven on the up, good connection as well but straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, no run

items.text: short of length, on the pads, dabbed towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of length, into the body, defended down the pitch
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Bravo, no run
